docs.title: tinydantic
docs.text:
tinydantic is a simple Python object-document mapper (ODM) for TinyDB.

Warning

tinydantic is currently a work in progress 🏗️

There's not much to see here yet, but feel free to grab your hard hat and have a look around! 👷

Get started

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text:
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on Keep a Changelog, and this project adheres to Semantic Versioning.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
tinydantic is available on PyPI and can be installed with pip.

pip install tinydantic

docs.title: SPDX & REUSE Compliance
docs.text:
This repository is compliant with version 3.2 of the REUSE Specification.

License files are contained in the LICENSES/ directory and additional copyright & license information can be found in REUSE.toml.

Install the reuse tool and run the following commands to create a software bill of materials (SBOM) in SPDX format:

reuse spdx
